Welcome

I am a double major in Computer Science and Economics at the Rochester Institute of Technology.

I'm interested in type systems, market structures, static analysis, and the organization of people, among other things.

I am a runner and cyclist (some time triathlete). Currently (2015), a summary of my logs may be found here.

Tinkerings from my free time may be found on my Github.
